users: This is a project designed to help controlling Android MediaPlayer class. It makes it easier to use MediaPlayer ListView and RecyclerView. Also it tracks the most visible item in scrolling list. When new item in the list become the most visible, this library gives an API to track it.
A Layoutmanager that must be used with RecyclerView. When list is scrolled views are moved by circular trajectory
This is a library designed for highlighting hashtags ("#example") and catching click on them.
This is a pet project that shows how to implement shared element image transition between activities on pre-Lollipop devices on Android.

ActionsContentView is an standalone library implements actions/content swiping view (AKA Side Navigation UI Pattern, AKA Facebook side menu).  The library doesn't use any specific code introduced in new Android SDK versions. This allows develop an application with an action/content swiping view for every version of Android from 2.2 and up.
This is not an official application for TI SensorTag. It is a sample project for Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) usage on Android. There was Texas Instruments SensorTag module used for demonstration.
One tool to manage key generation, key storing and encryption on different APIs of Android.
Repository was desired and is made to store Android reusable code in a way of simple markdown files and java classes.

Published on Maven Central and jCenter Java Library that compares 2 images with the same sizes and shows the differences visually by drawing rectangles. Some parts of the image can be excluded from the comparison. Can be used for automation qa tests.

ANDROID. ChipsLayoutManager (SpanLayoutManager, FlowLayoutManager). A custom layout manager for RecyclerView which mimicric TextView span behaviour, flow layouts behaviour with support of amazing recyclerView features
